name: exinst
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))
-| wi(wex(s0, w0), wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))
-| wi(wex(s0, w0), wi(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wi(w0, w1))
-| wvd2(wex(s0, w0), w0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))
-| wvd2(wex(s0, w0), w0, w1)

comment: Existential Instantiation. Virtual deduction form of ~ exlimexi . (Contributed by Alan Sare, 21-Apr-2013.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
